comment._content: descendant of: Count Christian Gunther von Bernstorff (1769--1835) who was a Danish and Prussian statesman and diplomat, son of Count Andreas Peter von Bernstorff. (from Wikipedia) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Günther_von_Bernstorff click von Bernstorff link to see other photos of this fellow and as well has his father, the Count, who was the German ambassador. The son was married to an American woman during WW1, he apparently was seriously injured in the war, according to the NYTimes article describing his controversial marriage.
